name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在使學生了解認知人因工程理論與研究方法，並使學生能應用這些理論與研究方法來探討與解決實際問題，提升整體系統之績效。

Week 01: Module 1-Introduction
Week 02: Module 1-Lecture: Cognitive ergonomics
Week 03: Module 1-Lecture: User experience
Week 04: Module 1-Lecture: Human-centered design
Week 05: No class (Holiday)
Week 06: Module 2-Mental workload: Lecture
Week 07: Module 2-Mental workload: Paper reading & discussion
Week 08: Module 2-Mental workload: Practice & presentation
Week 09: Module 3-Situation awareness: Lecture
Week 10: Module 3-Situation awareness: Paper reading & discussion
Week 11: Module 3-Situation awareness: Practice & presentation
Week 12: Module 4-Mental model/Card sorting: Lecture
Week 13: Module 4-Mental model/Card sorting: Paper reading & discussion
Week 14: Module 4-Mental model/Card sorting: Practice & presentation
Week 15: Module 5-Usability testing: Lecture
Week 16: Module 5-Usability testing:Paper reading & discussion
Week 17: Module 5-Usability testing: Practice & presentation
Week 18: Final exam
